Class RuleBookBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang.RuleBookBuilder<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TerminatingRuleBookBuilder<T>

    public class RuleBookBuilder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TerminatingRuleBookBuilder<T>
    The initial builder used to build a RuleBook.
